  revealjs:
    gongtimer:
      - allottedTime: 1

  - gongtimer

## This adds a time bar

The time bar is at the bottom of your screen.

## Why is it called gong?

Because of a long tradition at RStudio / Posit where lightning talks are timed out by Hadley beating on a gong.
